description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Gain understanding of customer’s needs through direct communication
              
              •	Collaborate closely with global team to complete design and testing documentation
              
              •	Provide technical expertise for functional specifications
              
              •	Design and Develop application when customization or extensions to Microsoft solutions are needed
              
              •	Responsible for coding, unit testing and creating supporting documentation.
              
              •	Continuously improve existing system by new technologies
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Good knowledge in software/web application development using C#, ASP.NET MVC
              
              •	Experience in front-end skill: HTML5/CSS3, Javascript/Jquery, Bootstrap, Angular2+ will be added advantage
              
              •	Experience or knowledge in Cloud Computing: Azure is a plus
              
              •	Good English verbal and written communication skill
              
              •	Customer-focused attitude and desire to interface directly with end-user clients
              
              •	Strong conceptual, analytic, and problem solving skills
              
              •	Ability to work both individually and as a team player with the people skills to effectively interact with staff at all levels of the firm
              

              Your Future Job Location offers you
              
              •	Work in a dynamic and fast growing global company.
              
              •	Advanced career development with overseas training and working opportunities.
              
              •	Minimum 15 annual leaves and 1 day leave on your birthday per year.
              
              •	Health insurance for employees and family.
              
              •	Lunch and parking allowances.
              
              •	Join in various team building and sport activities.
              
              •	13th-month salary and annual bonus.
              
              •	Annual performance appraisal.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th month salary + Performance Bonus
